BUG_REPORT.Title: ZIP field accepts more than 5 digits
BUG_REPORT.Precondition: web site www.....com is open" "all fields empty" "create file txt with data 12345678"
BUG_REPORT.Steps_to_reproduce: copy data 12345678 from file txt and paste in ZIP field
BUG_REPORT.Expected_result: The ZIP field only accepts the first 5 digits
BUG_REPORT.ERROR: The ZIP field accepts the All 8 digits
